MysticalVision.title: The Crystal Dome and Flaming Heart
MysticalVision.Summary: A soul passes through a transparent dome to behold a flaming heart suspended in space, representing divine love and initiation.

MysticalVision.title: The Cloaked Child and the Sun Tree
MysticalVision.Summary: A child emerges from shadow and touches a golden tree radiating solar glyphs, merging innocence with cosmic vision.

MysticalVision.title: Ascent Through the Seven Gates
MysticalVision.Summary: A figure ascends through seven symbolic gates, shedding illusions and unlocking higher awareness at each threshold.

MysticalVision.title: Vision of the Crowned Seraphim
MysticalVision.Summary: Winged beings bearing starry crowns encircle the seer, who receives the spiral flame of initiation.

MysticalVision.title: The Mirror of Infinite Forms
MysticalVision.Summary: A living mirror reflects endless versions of the self, revealing the symbolic multiplicity within identity.
